website_summaries.verdict: The powerful motor and long hose and cord are versatile, but you may only be able to use it in short sessions due to an overheating problem.
pros: Has a long cord and hose to extend reach
4-gallon tank is constructed from metal, as is the hose
Ships with a variety of accessories and 2 filters
cons: This option has a tendency to overheat easily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size and so quite that I would use it in the middle of the night!
customer_reviews.author: Rekkof

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the PowerSmith to vacuum warm ash out of our stoker stove once a month. So far so good! The other vac we had was made of plastic so when we Vacumned out the ash, even though it was only warm ash, we would take it right outside. This one we just sweep, let it run 30 seconds longer to make sure all the ash is out of the hose, like it states, and leave it sit right in the basement. The Powersmith has a longer hose than most of the others, also like all the attachments which came with it. L
customer_reviews.author: Cabin lady

customer_reviews.title: Dust free!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and completely dust free. We like the fact that it came with an extra filter and a very long cord and a very long hose. The only thing that was even slightly negative is that it could get clogged if you’re not careful about the size of the ash that you are vacuuming. Just take out the big pieces first and you’ll be fine. Well-made and attractive looking also.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah D.

customer_reviews.title: over heats
customer_reviews.text: Horrible heat coming from top where the motor is! I am kinda afraid to keep using it. looked like it was a good deal,,, now not so sure. Anybody have any ideas as to what to do? Anyone haveing these issues? Please help! I have had this for just a few weeks now and used in only 6 times!
customer_reviews.author: classyclaws

customer_reviews.title: Dont vacuum anything to big
customer_reviews.text: First time I used the vacuum on a chimney sweep I had to unplug it within 10 minutes and get my full-size vacuum any un burn piece of wood or anything over an inch big will not go through the vacuum then you have to take the hose and shake it vigorously until the little piece comes out waste of time and money. In a perfect world if you were cleaning a fireplace with only a tiny pieces of ash it would work but if you’re seriously using it to do jobs junk. You need a larger hose.
customer_reviews.author: Frank the great

customer_reviews.title: Best value iMHO
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, powerful, and the included attachments make cleaning easy. The unit is also available without attachments, but I would not recommend that.
customer_reviews.author: BinNH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my pellet stove
customer_reviews.text: Should of bought this years ago. Ash vacuum is amazing. Great suction. No negative issues at all. Can do 5 or 6 once a week cleanings before having to empty the container, simply awesome. Highly recommend the PowerSmith!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a great ash vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It is a great ash vacuum. The only draw back is you can only run it for 15 minutes before it over heats and shuts down. After it cools off you can use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The motor burned up after only a few uses and caught the filter on fire. It filled our living room with smoke. We contacted Amazon and they referred us to the company who is trying to make us pay to ship it back for evaluation. Not happy at all with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah E

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like it, and for the price you can’t do better. This works much better than an ash vac I bought from Amazon a few years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Partherios

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is the only warm/cold ash vacuum I could find for a pellet stove! It’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Simons

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace vacuum works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son for use in cleaning his fireplace. He said it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Deb K

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, it broke after not even a year! Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible product. It just died on me after having it not even a year! So disappointed and what a waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This has made clean up for our pellet stove a breeze! Good quality and functionality! Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Works good, motor runs hot and kinda loud but its expected as a shop vac
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Shammo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with my purchase. The hose is nice and long plus attachments are great. Loved this vacuum for cleaning out my pellet stove, but know I will use it for jobs. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Whitten

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great power and the dust doesn't get all over the house when vacuuming the ashes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: motor overheats easily
customer_reviews.text: not good for wood ashes, thin suction tube gets plugged up and motor over heats and turns off Probably fine for pellet stoves
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Was gladly surprised. Cleaned two wood stoves and pipes. As well as one chimney with a brush. Used the vacuum to suck up the creosote so my basement would not be full of dust. Besides the motor getting hot it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why use to for its purpose, then the inside gets burned?
customer_reviews.text: Late 2019 early 2020 the inside got burned out. So it did hold like it said it would for it’s purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Natashia l. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good value for easy cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Good for an ash vacuum, but make sure it is cleaned after every use to avoid clogging.
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson Berrey

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product with no mess!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to clean out wood burning stove. Then also decided to use for our grill/smoker. Fabulous project. Incredibly impressed. Our ash that we are sucking up is very fine, yet this vacuum creates no extra mess or dust.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE DUST
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is of high quality and I'm very satisfied with the operation
customer_reviews.author: Recon Marine

customer_reviews.title: Even when vacuuming cool ash the motor heats up very quickly and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this unit. Even when vacuuming cool ash the motor heats up very quickly and the unit shuts down. Bad product.
customer_reviews.author: robert parsons

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Good size and quality. Does a good job cleaning out the pellet stove.
customer_reviews.author: Knitting Nana 749

customer_reviews.title: Surprised on this Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in February 2018 as a spare to my other PowerSmith Vac. Finally opened it up in January 2019 to use and within 5 minutes the motor stopped working. Very disappointed about this.
customer_reviews.author: Maxxnas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the attachments that helps clean hard to reach areas in the pellet stove.
customer_reviews.author: Francis C.

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I use it to clean out my pellet stove could use a little more suction but still works good.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Bowser

customer_reviews.title: GreAt
customer_reviews.text: It true a great vacuum work well. Really the only down fall is it creates a lot of static
customer_reviews.author: branden

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s been good so far for the money... only time will tell
customer_reviews.author: austin jordan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ash vac
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ash vac. the longer hose is a plus and its well made. The filters are super commercial looking and the unit operates as it should. Beats ShopVac in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: rchunter

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. It works great and the tank is so large I can use it for a month without having to empty it. Highly recommend this vac.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S

customer_reviews.text: Works good, doesn’t seem to hold the 4 gallons it claims to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit and attachments make cleaning a pellet stove very easy.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Onda

customer_reviews.title: Work good
customer_reviews.text: It does get warm on top but has not shut of on me yet. They do to work on that.
customer_reviews.author: Karen & Jeff Coy

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: It did what I expected would do. It is not for real heavy and large material. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Engel

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.. Has done what we expected it to
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.. Has done what we expected it to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hose is a bit to long and cord to plug it in but quit and does the job
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Motor runs hot and shuts the vac down.
customer_reviews.text: We bought a cheap ash vac last year that spewed dust. I wanted to replace it this year. I did tons of research looking for the top ash vacs and decided on the Power Smith. I spent more on this because of the good reviews. I'm so disappointed. While running it does a good job but the motor overheats quickly and it has an automatic shut off. Before I finish cleaning the pellet insert it shuts down and I have to wait 10-20 min. for it to cool before I can continue. Let's just say I'm not a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: Ozark Farm Chick

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ash vacuum. It's quiet, has wheels, a long cord & vacuum hose, & comes with some nice attachments . I have a pellet stove & it makes cleaning a 5 minute job. There are many cheaper ash vacs available, do yourself a favor and don't but one. The first one I had was a cheaper one from a box store. Only lasted 2 yrs, had poor suction, a much shorter house, and basically was a pia.
customer_reviews.author: tom wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We have two pellet stoves in our home and have used multiple vacuums over the years. This one has so far been excellent. No dust gets out of the container. Plenty of auction. Accessories are a nice touch. I wish they had a wire wrap on it and a better method for the tools to lock into the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Great for clean up.
customer_reviews.text: I use fireplace tools remove the majority of ash and unburned wood chunks. And then use the vacuum to clean up the fine ash that winds up on the stove exterior and in the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Raymster

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what you expect it to easy to set up clean and store
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for pellet stove.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was needed for removing ash from my new pellet stove.
customer_reviews.author: James C

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Good suction, long durable hose and power cord. We use every couple days to clean out our pellet stove ashes.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Brand new. Quit working after 2 times.
customer_reviews.text: This product powered on twice and quit. I’m unhappy with initial quality. Hopefully customer service will help resolve issue via replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Edens

customer_reviews.title: Awful - don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This works awful - will work for only 3 minutes and quits! Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Guzewicz

customer_reviews.title: Electrical Fire Hazard!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift a couple years ago and have used it a dozen times or so. I took it apart after it began making really odd arcing sounds. I bench tested the motor and was treated to a shower of sparks eminating from the brushes and commutator. What a frightening piece of junk. I love the fact the motor is also encased in combustible foam. If you look at the label, this unit is NOT UL listed! It's inspected by Intertek, a UK company. If you have one, be very cautious using it. It's an electrical fire waiting to happen due to it's cheap, Chinese motor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PowerSmith PAVC102 10 Amp 4 Gallon All-In-One Ash and Shop Vacuum/Blower with 10' Hose, Wheeled Base, Crevice Tool, Brush Nozzle, Pellet Stove Hose, 16' Power Cord, 1 1/4" Adapter, and 2 Filters
product_meta.description:
The PowerSmith easy-to-use, stainless steel ash vacuum can handle warm and Cool ash cleanup. With a 10' hose and wheels, vacuuming is safe, easy and quick. Don't forget to use the included deep-cleaning kit for best results. Comes with two filters; additional filters sold separately. Great power, fantastic value. Size: 14'' DIA. X 18''h. Color: stainless steel.

• POWERFUL YET QUIET – 10 Amp motor operating at 79 Db
• CAPACITY – 4-gallon ash capacity means less trip to empty the canister
• VERSITILITY – Use as a vacuum and a blower for cleanup and clearing debris in the garage, walkway, furnace, grill, wood stove, pellet stove, and work shop.
• ACCESSORIES – Includes 2 filters, deep cleaning kit, and 10 ft metal lined hose
Add the PowerSmith 4 Gallon 10 Amp Ash Vacuum to your home cleaning set today!
feature_bullets: Cleans warm and cool Ash out of fireplaces, wood stoves, pellet stoves, and BBQ grills
Washable and replaceable heat-resistant filter traps the finest dust and Ash
Heat-resistant metal hose and metal canister with 4 gallon Ash capacity
Quiet (79 dB) and powerful 10 amp motor
Connecting the hose to the air outlet allows use as a blower

specifications.Included Components: One 10 Amp 4 Gallon Ash vacuum with 2 filter pack, deep cleaning kit, and 10 ft metal lined hose
specifications.Warranty Description: Backed by the PowerSmith 2 Year Manufacturer Warranty with US-Based Customer Support
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars101 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
